mapper.sql: EDU_TEACHER.ID, EDU_TEACHER.NAME, EDU_TEACHER.EDUCATION, EDU_TEACHER.CAREER, EDU_TEACHER.IS_STAR, EDU_TEACHER.PIC_PATH, EDU_TEACHER.STATUS, EDU_TEACHER.CREATE_TIME, EDU_TEACHER.UPDATE_TIME, EDU_TEACHER.SUBJECT_ID, EDU_TEACHER.SORT
mapper.delete: UPDATE EDU_TEACHER SET EDU_TEACHER.STATUS=1 WHERE EDU_TEACHER.ID = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE EDU_TEACHER SET EDU_TEACHER.ID = #{id}, EDU_TEACHER.NAME = #{name}, EDU_TEACHER.EDUCATION = #{education}, EDU_TEACHER.CAREER = #{career}, EDU_TEACHER.IS_STAR = #{isStar}, EDU_TEACHER.PIC_PATH = #{picPath}, EDU_TEACHER.UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime}, EDU_TEACHER.SUBJECT_ID =#{subjectId}, EDU_TEACHER.SORT=#{sort} WHERE EDU_TEACHER.ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT EDU_TEACHER.ID as id, EDU_TEACHER.NAME as name, EDU_TEACHER.EDUCATION as education, EDU_TEACHER.PIC_PATH as picPath, EDU_TEACHER.CAREER as career FROM EDU_TEACHER LEFT JOIN EDU_COURSE_TEACHER ON EDU_COURSE_TEACHER.TEACHER_ID = EDU_TEACHER.ID WHERE EDU_COURSE_TEACHER.COURSE_ID=#{value}
